name: Cinnamon Roll Apple Crisp
author: Jillian
summary: This is a great Thanksgiving and Christmas dessert that everyone will love! Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: 1 (12.4 ounce) package refrigerated cinnamon roll dough with icing
8  Granny Smith apples, peeled and sliced, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Roll cinnamon rolls onto a work surface to desired thickness; press into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish
Mix oats, brown sugar, flour, 1 tablespoon cinnamon, and salt on a bowl; add margarine and mix until crumbly
Spread apples over cinnamon roll crust
Mix white sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon together in a bowl and sprinkle over apples; top with oat mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until apples are tender, 40 to 50 minutes
Place icing in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave until warmed, 20 to 30 seconds
